articles.description: The continuous delay in elections and seeming disharmony within the ad-hoc committee has led to international suspension for the Wrestling Federation of India.
articles.content:
This article originally appeared in The Fields newsletter, Game Points, on August 30, 2023. Sign up here to get the newsletter directly delivered to your inbox every week.

articles.title: Stricker: Swiss rising star, with Federer connection, stuns Tsitsipas - Australian Open
articles.description: Dominic Stricker, 21, is on the brink of the top 100 after upsetting Stefanos Tsitsipas at the US Open, a result sending him into a Grand Slam third round for the first time.
articles.content: Notably, this was not his first five-set triumph at a major. Stricker also did the same at Wimbledon, beating Australias Alexei Popyrin for his first Grand Slam main-draw victory. He beat Popyrin aga… [+679 chars]
